func.title: PlaceAnimal

param.name: animal_id
param.desc: Type of the animal to be created.

func.desc: Creates an animal of the specified type in the landscape. The placement position depends on the Placement value in the DefCore of the animal's definition. Returns a pointer to the newly created animal.
func.remark: Redirects to id->Place() in 9.0 OC, to be removed in 10.0 OC. Use the Place function instead.
